text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
14 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
September 10, 1959
REX
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
NAEB
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Our meeting with Dr. McLuhan will be held at the
LaSalle Hotel in Chicago Wednesday, September 23rd and
Thursday, September 24th, beginning at 11:30 A.M. on the
23rd in the Illini Center on the 20th floor of the hotel.
Please pay for your transportation and make your hotel
reservation and we will have vouchers there for you to
sign for reimbursement. This trip should not be tax free.
NAEB HEADQUAlU-Kb
SEP 11 1959
AM PÂ»
7 i Bj 9 j 10111 j 12 j i|2(B|4|5|6
I would appreciate a note or postcard letting me know
whether you will be able to attend. I certainly hope that
you can make it. We will break up early enough Thursday
afternoon to permit you to catch a train or plane home that
evening.
